Name: LU 735 - Zoning, 91-32 63rd Drive Rezoning, Queens (C 200178 ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 200178 ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 735).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fnil\fprq2\fcharset0 Courier;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, 63-68 RWKOP, LLC, \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 14a, eliminating from within an existing R4 District a C2-2 District, changing from an R4 District to an R7A District, and establishing within the proposed R7A District and C2-3 District, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the construction of a nine-story mixed-use building at 91-32 63\super rd\nosupersub  Drive in the Rego Park neighborhood of Queens, Community District 6 (ULURP No. C 200178 ZMQ) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on February 19, 2021, its decision dated February 17, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 200179 ZRQ (Pre. L.U. No. 736), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720\f0 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on February 23, 2021;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Revised Negative Declaration issued February 12, 2020, which supersedes the Negative Declaration issued October 1\super st\nosupersub , 2020, and Revised Environmental Assessment Statement issued February 11, 2020 (CEQR No. is 20DCP107Q) which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise (E-568) (the \ldblquote Revised Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:  \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-568) and Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 200178 ZMQ, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri144\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further changed by the Zoning Map, Section No. 14a: \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 1.\tab eliminating from within an existing R4 District a C2-2 District bounded by Austin Street, a line 100 feet southeasterly of 63\super rd\nosupersub  Drive, the northerly boundary line of the Long Island Railroad Main Line Right-of-Way, and 63\super rd\nosupersub  Drive; \par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 2.\tab changing from an R4 District to an R7A District property bounded by Austin Street, a line 100 feet southeasterly of 63\super rd\nosupersub  Drive, the northerly boundary line of the Long Island Railroad Main Line Right-of-Way, and 63\super rd\nosupersub  Drive; \par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R7A District and C2-3 District bounded by Austin Street, a line 100 feet southeasterly of 63\super rd\nosupersub  Drive, the northerly boundary line of the Long Island Railroad Main Line Right-of-Way, and 63\super rd\nosupersub  Drive;\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated October 5, 2020, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-568, Borough of Queens, Community District 6.\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on March 18, 2021, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr\par
